main.name: Connor Meth
main.description: I have experience with JavaScript, Ruby on Rails, React.js, and React Native. I've worked in all deparments of a software development team, providing me unique insight and understanding of the SDLC.
main.bio: As a former college athlete and senior captain, I gained the knowledge of how to work within a team and also how to lead.
